# Bless Thrower, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind‐affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]] 

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One allied creature 

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level 

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** The Mage’s Tower website

As *[[Bless Thrower (Spell)|bless thrower]]* except the recipient receives a +1 ranged attack bonus and a +1d8 damage bonus per 4 caster levels (maximum of +5/+5d8 at 17th level) when attacking with any kind of thrown object.
